bibl.title: Egypt in the Fragments of Greek Comedy.
bibl.note: Aristophanes' and Menandros' full texts are not considered. - 1. The verb αἰγυπτιάζειν. - 2. The adjective Αἰγύπτιος. - 3. The Egyptian perfume. - 4. The river Nile. - 5. The goddess Isis. - 6. King Ptolemaios.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: GOBARA Mohamed, Egypt in the Fragments of Greek Comedy.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 391-401.

Aristophanes' and Menandros' full texts are not considered. - 1. The verb αἰγυπτιάζειν. - 2. The adjective Αἰγύπτιος. - 3. The Egyptian perfume. - 4. The river Nile. - 5. The goddess Isis. - 6. King Ptolemaios.
